resources.string:
Hi, my name is Bryan 

This is an app I am working on for a course called 
Developing Android Apps in Kotlin 
It is available on Udacity 

I have had no experience developing Android Apps before this. 
However, this course has been a great learning experience. 
I am looking forward to learning how to develop more complex apps in the future.
